Summary: i did a security patrol in 1995 i got an alarm on a school at about 3;00am i walked across the ball field to inter the school when i looked up i saw a flash in the sky then the flash moved across the sky then i saw a white
divs: Sighting DetailsI did police work backin 1995 i was on patrol when i got an alarm call on a school it was 300am as i was walking across the ballfild i saw what i thogth was a flash of lighting but it looked like a flash of lighting that jumped from one place to the other then it just started flooting across the sky untile it flooted out of sight.
